contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|brainiac|brainiacs}} '''Brainiac''' may refer to: * In [[DC Comics]]: ** [[Brainiac (comics)]], a fictional supervillain in DC Comics, and an enemy of Superman *** ''[[Brainiac (story arc)]]'', 2008 storyline in ''Action Comics'' *** [[Brainiac (Smallville)]], version of the villain in the TV series Smallville ** [[Brainiac 5]], a member of the Legion of Super-Heroes * [[Brainiac (band)]], an American indie rock band * ''[[Brainiac: Science Abuse]]'', a British television programme ** ''[[Brainiac: History Abuse]]'', a spin-off of the above * ''[[The Brainiac]]'', a 1962 Mexican horror film directed by Chano Urueta * [[Brainiac (Dark Angel)|"Brainiac" (''Dark Angel'')]], an episode of the television series ''Dark Angel'' * [[Function BRAINIAC]], an energy drink * ''Brainiac: Adventures in the Curious, Competitive, Compulsive World of Trivia Buffs'' <!--(2006, ISBN 1-4000–6445-7, trade paperback ISBN 0-8129–7499-9)-->, a book written by [[Ken Jennings]] * [[Computer performance#brainiac | brainiac techniques]] for improving computer performance == See also == *[[Geniac]], an educational toy billed as a computer {{disambig}}
